data.name: The Art of You: Building Your Personal Brand
data.summary:
Attend this session and learn:

How to craft a successful personal brand that communicates your value proposition
How to establish goals for your personal brand and determine what platforms are best suited for you based on those goals
How you can weave your personal brand and business together to achieve both personal and business goals
data.speakers:
Lindsay Mauch
Founder & Chief Marketing Officer
LTM Digital
Speaker
